The ggip package enables data visualization of IP addresses and networks.

It achieves this by mapping one-dimensional IP data onto a two-dimensional grid.
For more details about this mapping, please see `vignette("visualizing-ip-data")`.

This introductory vignette is focused on how to use ggip functions to generate plots.


## Configuring the coordinate system

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ipaddress)
library(ggip)
```
